title.rendered: University of Chichester Global Distinction Scholarship 2025 [Funding; Fee Deduction]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the University of Chichester Global Distinction Scholarship 2025. Apply soon to secure your admission.

About the University of Chichester

The University of Chichester is a vibrant, modern university with campuses in the historic city of Chichester and the seaside town Bognor Regis. Ranked among the Top 40 UK universities (Guardian, 2024) Chichester offers a vibrant portfolio of programmes in subjects as diverse as business, dance, psychology, sports, computer science, media, engineering, fine art, history, law and education. Chichester is known for its close student community and outstanding student experience: it was recently rated among the top 20 UK universities for student satisfaction and for teaching quality.

Award value: Chichester Global Merit Scholarship 2025

  • Scholarship amount: £2,750
  • Celebrating and rewarding academic excellence, the Global Distinction Scholarship is a merit-based award, designed for top-performing international applicants across all undergraduate and postgraduate programmes.

Eligibility

  • No application required: eligible students are automatically considered.
  • Open to all non-UK nationals, excluding those in receipt of the University of Chichester EU/EEA Scholarship.
  • Available for both undergraduate and postgraduate applicants.
  • Scholarship fee discount applies to your first year of study only.
  • Applicants may only receive one University of Chichester scholarship.
  •  Each month, a scholarship panel carefully reviews eligible applicants and awards scholarships to those who exceed the entry requirements and demonstrate outstanding academic merit.
  • If you are selected, you will be notified via the email address you used for your application.
  • Please note: recipients of this scholarship may be asked to take part in promotional activities or international student support initiatives as part of the scholarship.

Deadline

Depending on your selection of course.

How to apply?

Each application will be considered on its merit, based on qualifications obtained and the submission of an application to by finding your ideal course here.

Click here to view the official notification of the Chichester Global Distinction Scholarship 2025
